thread.title: Playoffs return to Wrigley Field, no sign of Steve Bartman
thread.title_full: Playoffs return to Wrigley Field, no sign of Steve Bartman

title: Playoffs return to Wrigley Field, no sign of Steve Bartman
text: > Sports Playoffs return to Wrigley Field, no sign of Steve Bartman In this Monday, Oct. 19, 2015, photo, a seat where Chicago Cubs fan Steve Bartman sat as left fielder Moises Alou reached into the stands unsuccessfully for a foul ball tipped by Bartman is seen during a team workout for Game 3 in baseball's National League Championship Series between the Chicago Cubs and the New York Mets in Chicago. Twelve years after that fateful night when he deflected a foul ball that appeared destined to land in Alou's glove and help land the Cubs in the World Series for the first time since 1945, it is tough to find someone who has a bad thing to say about Steve Bartman. (AP Photo/Charles Rex Arbogast)
